rottapeli.gui.menulayer

Class HighscoreMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • rottapeli.gui.menulayer.Menu
      • rottapeli.gui.menulayer.HighscoreMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener

    public class HighscoreMenu
extends Menu
    The menu that is accessed from Main menu > High Score
    Author:
    Pavel

    • Constructor Detail

      • HighscoreMenu

        public HighscoreMenu(RottaPeli rp)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        rp - Game logic object.

    • Method Detail

      • enterName

        public void enterName()
        Check if any players hit the high score and should enter their name. If a player hasn't hit the high score, saves his score without a name.

      • letNextPlayerEnterName

        public void letNextPlayerEnterName()
        Moves the player queue up and lets the next player enter their name. If no players left in the queue, shows default menu.

      • showMenuWithNameEntering

        public void showMenuWithNameEntering(int plr)
        Show menu with a text field for the player to enter their name.
        Parameters:
        plr - ID of the player.

      • showScore

        public void showScore(int rank,
             int playersRank)
        Creates a single label that shows the name and a score of the specified rank in the high score. If player that was playing the game recently hit that rank, create a text field for name entering instead.
        Parameters:
        rank - Rank of the high score that should be shown.
        playersRank - Rank that the player hit.

      • createNameTextField

        public void createNameTextField()
        Creates a text field for name entering.

      • setNameFieldText

        public void setNameFieldText()
        Set a default text to the name entering text field.

      • createComponents

        public void createComponents(int playersRank)
        Creates components for the menu to show.
        Parameters:
        playersRank - Rank of the player in the high score. If no game was played recently, give a value that is out of bounds as a parameter. For example if only top ten scores are shown, put playersRank = 11 to show the menu without a textfiels.

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        Performs all necessary actions to make this menu show up. Creates all neccessary components. Show the menu without a text field for entering a name.
        Specified by:
        showMenu in class Menu

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae)
        Reacts to an actionEvent, a button press for instance. If score should be entered, confirms the entered name regardless of the actual ActionEvent.
        Parameters:
        ae - ActionEvent that triggered this method.

      • backPressed

        public void backPressed()
        React to the Back button being pressed. Return to the Main menu.

      • confirmNameEnter

        public void confirmNameEnter()
        React to the name enter confirmation. Lets the next player enter their name or shows the basic high score menu.
